name: Dark Water
summary_text: A mother and her 6 year old daughter move into a creepy apartment whose every surface is permeated by water.

name: The Brand New Testament
summary_text: Did you know that God is alive and lives in Brussels with his daughter?

name: Boat Trip
summary_text: Two straight men mistakenly end up on a "gays only" cruise.

name: Tank Girl
summary_text: A girl is among the few survivors of a dystopian Earth. Riding a war tank, she fights against the tyranny of a mega-corporation that dominates the remaining potable water supply of the planet.

name: Godzilla
summary_text: American nuclear weapons testing results in the creation of a seemingly unstoppable, dinosaur-like beast.

name: Bubble Boy
summary_text: Bubble Boy's been in a bubble all his life due to no immune system. A cute blonde girl befriends BB. Her boyfriend proposes and BB decides to travel across USA to Niagara Falls to stop the wedding.

name: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes
summary_text: In a futuristic world that has embraced ape slavery, Caesar, the son of the late simians Cornelius and Zira, surfaces after almost twenty years of hiding out from the authorities, and prepares for a slave revolt against humanity.

name: Ludo
summary_text: From a resurfaced sex tape to a rogue suitcase of money, four wildly different stories overlap at the whims of fate, chance and one eccentric criminal.

name: Darkness Falls
summary_text: A vengeful spirit has taken the form of the Tooth Fairy to exact vengeance on the town that lynched her 150 years earlier. Her only opposition is the only child, now grown up, who has survived her before.

name: Obsessed
summary_text: A successful asset manager, who has just received a huge promotion, is blissfully happy in his career and in his marriage. But when a temp worker starts stalking him, all the things he's worked so hard for are placed in jeopardy.

name: The Secret of My Success
summary_text: A talented young man can't get an executive position without rising through the ranks, so he comes up with a shortcut, which also benefits his love life.

name: In Your Eyes
summary_text: Two seemingly unconnected souls from different corners of the United States make a telepathic bond that allows them to see, hear and feel the other's experiences, creating a bond that apparently can't be broken.

name: King Kong
summary_text: A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an isolated island and encounters a colossal giant gorilla.

name: Interstate 60: Episodes of the Road
summary_text: Neal Oliver, a very confused young man and an artist, takes a journey of a lifetime on a highway I60 that doesn't exist on any of the maps, going to the places he never even heard of, searching for an answer and his dreamgirl.

name: Two Days in Paris
summary_text: Marion and Jack try to rekindle their relationship with a visit to Paris, home of Marion's parents -- and several of her ex-boyfriends.

name: Eli
summary_text: A boy receiving treatment for his auto-immune disorder discovers that the house he's living in isn't as safe as he thought.

name: Tomorrow, When the War Began
summary_text: When their country is invaded and their families are taken, eight unlikely teenagers band together to fight.

name: Jodhaa Akbar
summary_text: A sixteenth century love story about a marriage of alliance that gave birth to true love between a great Mughal emperor, Akbar, and a Rajput princess, Jodha.

name: Blue Crush
summary_text: As a hard-core surfer girl prepares for a big competition, she finds herself falling for a football player.

name: Imagine Me & You
summary_text: A newlywed bride becomes infatuated with another woman who questions her sexual orientation, promoting a stir among the bride's family and friends.

name: Rififi
summary_text: Four men plan a technically perfect crime, but the human element intervenes...

name: Everybody Knows
summary_text: Laura, a Spanish woman living in Buenos Aires, returns to her hometown outside Madrid with her two children to attend her sister's wedding. However, the trip is upset by unexpected events that bring secrets into the open.

name: Sleepless
summary_text: A cop with a connection to the criminal underworld scours a nightclub in search of his kidnapped son.

name: Pierrot le Fou
summary_text: Pierrot escapes his boring society and travels from Paris to the Mediterranean Sea with Marianne, a girl chased by hit-men from Algeria. They lead an unorthodox life, always on the run.

name: White Heat
summary_text: A psychopathic criminal with a mother complex makes a daring break from prison and leads his old gang in a chemical plant payroll heist.

name: Danny Collins
summary_text: An aging rock star decides to change his life when he discovers a 40-year-old letter written to him by John Lennon.

name: The Exterminating Angel
summary_text: The guests at an upper-class dinner party find themselves unable to leave.

name: The Three Stooges
summary_text: While trying to save their childhood orphanage, Moe, Larry and Curly inadvertently stumble into a murder plot and wind up starring in a reality television show.

name: The Machine
summary_text: In efforts to construct perfect android killing machines in a war against China, UK scientists exceed their goal and create a sentient robot.

name: Cypher
summary_text: An unsuspecting, disenchanted man finds himself working as a spy in the dangerous, high-stakes world of corporate espionage. Quickly getting way over-his-head, he teams up with a mysterious femme fatale.

name: High Life
summary_text: A father and his daughter struggle to survive in deep space where they live in isolation.

name: The Immigrant
summary_text: 1921. An innocent immigrant woman is tricked into a life of burlesque and vaudeville until a dazzling magician tries to save her and reunite her with her sister who is being held in the confines of Ellis Island.

name: Oscar
summary_text: A gangster attempts to keep the promise he made to his dying father: that he would give up his life of crime and "go straight".

name: The Art of Self-Defense
summary_text: After being attacked on the street, a young man enlists at a local dojo, led by a charismatic and mysterious sensei, in an effort to learn how to defend himself from future threats.

name: Freaky
summary_text: After swapping bodies with a deranged serial killer, a young girl in high school discovers she has less than 24 hours before the change becomes permanent.

name: The Diary of a Teenage Girl
summary_text: A teen artist living in 1970s San Francisco enters into an affair with her mother's boyfriend.

name: The Idiots
summary_text: The group of people gather at the house in Copenhagen suburb to break all the limitations and to bring out the "inner idiot" in themselves.

name: Raise the Red Lantern
summary_text: A young woman becomes the fourth wife of a wealthy lord, and must learn to live with the strict rules and tensions within the household.

name: Multiplicity
summary_text: A man who never has enough time for the things he wants to do is offered the opportunity to have himself duplicated.

name: Batman: The Movie
summary_text: The Dynamic Duo faces four supervillains who plan to hold the world for ransom with the help of a secret invention that instantly dehydrates people.

name: Honey Boy
summary_text: A young actor's stormy childhood and early adult years as he struggles to reconcile with his father and deal with his mental health.

name: Kangaroo Jack
summary_text: Two childhood friends, a New York hairstylist and a would-be musician, get caught up with the mob and are forced to deliver $50,000 to Australia, but things go haywire when the money is lost to a wild kangaroo.

name: Alan Partridge
summary_text: When famous DJ Alan Partridge's radio station is taken over by a new media conglomerate, it sets in motion a chain of events which see Alan having to work with the police to defuse a potentially violent siege.

name: Seraphim Falls
summary_text: At the end of the Civil War, a colonel hunts down a man with whom he has a grudge.

name: The Nutcracker and the Four Realms
summary_text: A young girl is transported into a magical world of gingerbread soldiers and an army of mice.

name: Cleopatra
summary_text: Queen Cleopatra VII of Egypt experiences both triumph and tragedy as she attempts to resist the imperial ambitions of Rome.

name: The Lord of the Rings
summary_text: The Fellowship of the Ring embark on a journey to destroy the One Ring and end Sauron's reign over Middle-earth.

name: Envy
summary_text: A man becomes increasingly jealous of his friend's newfound success.

name: Are We There Yet?
summary_text: To impress a foxy divorcee, ladies' man Nick offers to take her kids on an extended road trip, unaware of the torture he's in for.

name: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
summary_text: A ship sent to investigate a wave of mysterious sinkings encounters the advanced submarine, the Nautilus, commanded by Captain Nemo.

name: To Live and Die in L.A.
summary_text: A fearless Secret Service agent will stop at nothing to bring down the counterfeiter who killed his partner.

name: Superbabies: Baby Geniuses 2
summary_text: A group of smart-talking toddlers find themselves at the center of a media mogul's experiment to crack the code to baby talk. The toddlers must race against time for the sake of babies everywhere.

name: The 15:17 to Paris
summary_text: An attempted terrorist attack on a Paris bound train is prevented by three courageous young Americans. Their friendship was their greatest weapon that saved the lives of those on board.

name: Celeste & Jesse Forever
summary_text: A divorcing couple tries to maintain their friendship while they both pursue other people.

name: Anything Else
summary_text: Jerry Falk learns a lesson the hard way when he falls in love with the beautiful but flighty Amanda.

name: Sid and Nancy
summary_text: The relationship between Sid Vicious, bassist for British punk group Sex Pistols, and his girlfriend Nancy Spungen is portrayed.

name: The Half of It
summary_text: When smart but cash-strapped teen Ellie Chu agrees to write a love letter for a jock, she doesn't expect to become his friend - or fall for his crush.

name: The Two Faces of January
summary_text: A thriller centered on a con artist, his wife, and a stranger who flee Athens after one of them is caught up in the death of a private detective.

name: Regarding Henry
summary_text: After being shot, a lawyer loses his memory and must relearn speech and mobility, but he has a loving family to support him.

name: Feast
summary_text: Patrons locked inside a bar are forced to fight monsters.

name: The Wackness
summary_text: It's the summer of 1994, and the streets of New York are pulsing with hip-hop. Set against this backdrop, a lonely teenager named Luke Shapiro spends his last summer before university selling marijuana throughout New York City, trading it with his unorthodox psychotherapist for treatment, while having a crush on his stepdaughter.

name: Boogeyman
summary_text: A young man tries to deal with the childhood terror that has never stopped haunting him.

name: Michael Collins
summary_text: Neil Jordan's historical biopic of Irish revolutionary Michael Collins, the man who led a guerrilla war against the UK, helped negotiate the creation of the Irish Free State, and led the National Army during the Irish Civil War.

name: Stretch
summary_text: A hard-luck limo driver struggles to go straight and pay off a debt to his bookie. He takes on a job with a crazed passenger, whose sought-after ledger implicates some seriously dangerous criminals.

name: Tumbbad
summary_text: A mythological story about a goddess who created the entire universe. The plot revolves around the consequences when humans build a temple for her first-born.

name: Dance of the Vampires
summary_text: A noted professor and his dim-witted apprentice fall prey to their inquiring vampires, while on the trail of the ominous damsel in distress.

name: White Oleander
summary_text: A teenager journeys through a series of foster homes after her mother goes to prison for committing a crime of passion.

name: Raanjhanaa
summary_text: Kundan, the son of a Hindu pundit, discovers that his childhood sweetheart Zoya loves city-bred Akram and wants to marry him. However, he persistently seeks to win her heart.

name: Erased
summary_text: An ex-CIA agent and his estranged daughter are forced on the run when his employers erase all records of his existence, and mark them both for termination as part of a wide-reaching international conspiracy.

name: Armored
summary_text: A newbie guard for an armored truck company is coerced by his veteran coworkers to steal a truck containing $42 million. But a wrinkle in their supposedly foolproof plan divides the group, leading to a potentially deadly resolution.

name: The Addams Family
summary_text: The eccentrically macabre family moves to a bland suburb where Wednesday Addams' friendship with the daughter of a hostile and conformist local reality show host exacerbates conflict between the families.

name: Barbershop
summary_text: A day in the life of a South Side Chicago barbershop.

name: Vikram Vedha
summary_text: Vikram, a no-nonsense police officer, accompanied by Simon, his partner, is on the hunt to capture Vedha, a smuggler and a murderer. Vedha tries to change Vikram's life, which leads to a conflict.

name: On the Basis of Sex
summary_text: The true story of Ruth Bader Ginsburg, her struggles for equal rights, and the early cases of a historic career that lead to her nomination and confirmation as U.S. Supreme Court Associate Justice.

name: At Eternity's Gate
summary_text: A look at the life of painter Vincent van Gogh during the time he lived in Arles and Auvers-sur-Oise, France.

name: L.A. Story
summary_text: With the help of a talking freeway billboard, a wacky weatherman tries to win the heart of an English newspaper reporter, who is struggling to make sense of the strange world of early 1990s Los Angeles.

name: Popeye
summary_text: The adventures of the famous sailor man and his friends in the seaside town of Sweethaven.

name: Damien: Omen II
summary_text: Damien the Antichrist, now about to turn thirteen years old, finally learns of his destiny under the guidance of an unholy disciple of Satan. Meanwhile dark forces begin to eliminate all those who suspect the child's true identity.

name: Romeo and Juliet
summary_text: When two young members of feuding families meet, forbidden love ensues.

name: Mannequin
summary_text: A young artist, searching for his vocation, makes a mannequin so perfect he falls in love with it. Finding the mannequin in a store window, he gets a job there and his creation comes to life.

name: In the Fade
summary_text: Katja's life collapses after the death of her husband and son in a bomb attack. After a time of mourning and injustice, Katja seeks revenge.

name: Firestarter
summary_text: A couple who participated in a potent medical experiment gain telepathic ability and then have a child who is pyrokinetic.

name: The Salton Sea
summary_text: After a tragic incident, a man drifts into a world populated by thugs and speed junkies.

name: Pontypool
summary_text: A radio host interprets the possible outbreak of a deadly virus which infects the small Ontario town he is stationed in.

name: Vampire Hunter D: Bloodlust
summary_text: When a girl is abducted by a vampire, a legendary bounty hunter is hired to bring her back.

name: Frankie and Johnny
summary_text: Johnny has just been released from prison, and gets a job in a café beside waitress Frankie. Frankie is a bit of a loner, but Johnny is determined their romance will blossom.

name: Slender Man
summary_text: In a small town in Massachusetts, a group of friends, fascinated by the internet lore of the Slender Man, attempt to prove that he doesn't actually exist - until one of them mysteriously goes missing.

name: Body Double
summary_text: A young actor's obsession with spying on a beautiful woman who lives nearby leads to a baffling series of events with drastic consequences.

name: Big Nothing
summary_text: A frustrated, unemployed professor joins forces with a scammer and a friend of his in a blackmailing scheme.

name: Goya's Ghosts
summary_text: Painter Francisco Goya faces a scandal involving his muse, who is labeled a heretic by a monk.

name: Angels in the Outfield
summary_text: When a boy prays for a chance to have a family if the California Angels win the pennant, angels are assigned to make that possible.

name: Dumplin'
summary_text: Willowdean ('Dumplin'), the plus-size teenage daughter of a former beauty queen, signs up for her mom's Miss Teen Bluebonnet pageant as a protest that escalates when other contestants follow her footsteps, revolutionizing the pageant and their small Texas town.

name: 8 Women
summary_text: One murdered man, eight women, each seeming to be eager than the others to know the truth. Gimme, gimme, gimme some clues to make up my mind. And eventually enter the truth. Oh, thou cruel woman!

name: 22 July
summary_text: A three-part story of Norway's worst terrorist attack in which over seventy people were killed. 22 July looks at the disaster itself, the survivors, Norway's political system and the lawyers who worked on this horrific case.

name: Ong Bak 2
summary_text: A young Thai boxer learns the skills and inner meaning of martial arts.

name: The Human Stain
summary_text: When a disgraced former college dean has a romance with a mysterious younger woman haunted by her dark, twisted past, he is forced to confront a shocking fact about his own life that he has kept secret for fifty years.

name: Sliver
summary_text: A woman moves into an exclusive New York City apartment building, which she soon discovers houses tenants with all manner of shocking secrets.

name: Last Holiday
summary_text: Upon learning of a terminal illness, a shy woman decides to sell all her possessions and live it up at a posh Central European hotel.

name: Anacondas: The Hunt for the Blood Orchid
summary_text: A scientific expedition sets out for Borneo to seek a flower called the Blood Orchid, which could grant longer life. Meanwhile, they run afoul of snakes and each other.

name: Gods and Monsters
summary_text: The last days of Frankenstein (1931) Director James Whale are explored.

name: Howards End
summary_text: A businessman thwarts his wife's bequest of an estate to another woman.

name: Contempt
summary_text: Screenwriter Paul Javal's marriage to his wife Camille disintegrates during movie production as she spends time with the producer. Layered conflicts between art and business ensue.

name: Cyborg
summary_text: A martial artist hunts a killer in a plague-infested urban dump of the future.

name: Julieta
summary_text: After a casual encounter, a brokenhearted woman decides to confront her life and the most important events about her stranded daughter.

name: The Prophecy
summary_text: At the scene of a bizarre murder, L.A. homicide detective Thomas Dagget discovers a lethal heavenly prophecy now being fulfilled on earth. In his fight to stop the forces of evil, he finds an unlikely ally in an elementary school teacher.

name: Instructions Not Included
summary_text: A man who has made a new life for himself and the daughter left on his doorstep 6 years ago finds his family threatened when the birth mother resurfaces.

name: Get Carter
summary_text: When his brother dies under mysterious circumstances in a car accident, London gangster Jack Carter travels to Newcastle to investigate.

name: Death on the Nile
summary_text: As Hercule Poirot enjoys a luxurious cruise down the Nile, a newlywed heiress is found murdered on board. Can Poirot identify the killer before the ship reaches the end of its journey?

name: Paranoid Park
summary_text: A teenage skateboarder's life begins to fray after he is involved in the accidental death of a security guard.

name: Unknown
summary_text: Five men wake up in a locked-down warehouse with no memory of who they are. They are forced to figure out who is good and who is bad to stay alive.

name: Village of the Damned
summary_text: A small town's women give birth to unfriendly alien children posing as humans.

name: Waar
summary_text: The efforts of the Pakistani security forces in their fight against terrorism and how the lives of security officials are affected. A retired security officer returns to save Pakistan from a major terrorist attack.

name: The Lion in Winter
summary_text: 1183 A.D.: King Henry II's three sons all want to inherit the throne, but he won't commit to a choice. They and his wife variously plot to force him.

name: Piku
summary_text: A quirky comedy about the relationship between a daughter and her aging father, whose eccentricities drive everyone crazy.

name: Ek Tha Tiger
summary_text: India's top spy Tiger and his love Zoya battle the dark world of intelligence and espionage that forbids its soldiers from loving the enemy.

name: Spartan
summary_text: The investigation into a kidnapping of the daughter of a high-ranking US government official.

name: Hatchet
summary_text: When a group of tourists in a New Orleans haunted swamp tour find themselves stranded in the wilderness, their evening of fun and spooks turns into a horrific nightmare.

name: Undisputed
summary_text: When heavyweight champion George "Iceman" Chambers lands in prison, the resident gangster arranges a boxing match with the reigning prison champ.

name: The Omega Man
summary_text: Biological war has decimated life on Earth. Los Angeles is a windswept ghost town where Robert Neville tools his convertible through sunlit streets foraging for supplies.

name: Happythankyoumoreplease
summary_text: Captures a generational moment - young people on the cusp of truly growing up, tiring of their reflexive cynicism, each in their own ways struggling to connect and define what it means to love and be loved.

name: Them
summary_text: Lucas and Clementine live peacefully in their isolated country house, but one night they wake up to strange noise... they're not alone... and a group of hooded assailants begin to terrorize them throughout the night.

name: Tequila Sunrise
summary_text: A former L.A. drug dealer tries to go straight but his past and his underworld connections bring him into the focus of the DEA, the Mexican feds and the Mexican drug cartels.

name: La Bamba
summary_text: Biographical story of the rise from nowhere of early rock and roll singer Ritchie Valens who died at age 17 in a plane crash with Buddy Holly and The Big Bopper.

name: Micmacs à tire-larigot
summary_text: A man and his friends come up with an intricate and original plan to destroy two big weapons manufacturers.

name: An Unfinished Life
summary_text: Desperate to provide care for her daughter, down-on-her-luck Jean moves in with her father in-law from whom she is estranged. Through time, they learn to forgive each other and heal old wounds.

name: Nanny McPhee Returns
summary_text: Nanny McPhee arrives to help a harried young mother who is trying to run the family farm while her husband is away at war, though she uses her magic to teach the woman's children and their two spoiled cousins five new lessons.

name: To Wong Foo Thanks for Everything, Julie Newmar
summary_text: Three drag queens travel cross-country until their car breaks down, leaving them stranded in a small town.

name: Playing for Keeps
summary_text: A former sports star who's fallen on hard times starts coaching his son's football team as a way to get his life together. His attempts to become an adult are met with challenges from the attractive football moms who pursue him at every turn.

name: Blood In, Blood Out
summary_text: Based on the true life experiences of poet Jimmy Santiago Baca, the film focuses on step-brothers Paco and Cruz, and their bi-racial cousin Miklo.

name: The Monster Squad
summary_text: A young group of monster fanatics attempt to save their hometown from Count Dracula and his monsters.

name: Above the Law
summary_text: A former Special Operations Vietnam vet works as a Chicago cop, and uncovers C.I.A. wrongdoing.

name: The End of the Tour
summary_text: The story of the five-day interview between Rolling Stone reporter David Lipsky and acclaimed novelist David Foster Wallace, which took place right after the 1996 publication of Wallace's groundbreaking epic novel, 'Infinite Jest.'

name: Mermaids
summary_text: An unconventional single mother relocates with her two daughters to a small Massachusetts town in 1963, where a number of events and relationships both challenge and strengthen their familial bonds.

name: Resident Evil: Degeneration
summary_text: Leon S. Kennedy and Claire Redfield must battle a rogue warrior seeking revenge after unleashing the deadly G-Virus, whilst a mutated monster goes on a rampage.

name: Home Again
summary_text: Life for a single mom in Los Angeles takes an unexpected turn when she allows three young guys to move in with her.

name: Nixon
summary_text: A biographical story of former U.S. President Richard Nixon, from his days as a young boy, to his eventual Presidency, which ended in shame.

name: The Football Factory
summary_text: An insight on the gritty life of a bored male, Chelsea football hooligan who lives for violence, sex, drugs & alcohol.

name: Jason Goes to Hell: The Final Friday
summary_text: Serial killer Jason Voorhees' supernatural origins are revealed.

name: Jeremiah Johnson
summary_text: A mountain man who wishes to live the life of a hermit becomes the unwilling object of a long vendetta by the Crow tribe and proves to be a match for their warriors in single combat on the early frontier.

name: Stree
summary_text: In the small town of Chanderi, the menfolk live in fear of an evil spirit named "Stree" who abducts men in the night. Based on the urban legend of "Nale Ba" that went viral in Karnataka in the 1990s.

name: Hiroshima Mon Amour
summary_text: A French actress filming an anti-war film in Hiroshima has an affair with a married Japanese architect as they share their differing perspectives on war.

name: Thunder Force
summary_text: In a world where supervillains are commonplace, two estranged childhood best friends reunite after one devises a treatment that gives them powers to protect their city.

name: Battle for the Planet of the Apes
summary_text: Ten years after a worldwide series of ape revolutions and a brutal nuclear war among humans, Caesar must protect survivors of both species from an insidious human cult and a militant ape faction alike.

name: Problem Child
summary_text: A young boy is just short of a monster. He is adopted by a loving man and his wacky wife. The laughs keep coming as the boy pushes them to the limits.

name: Dev.D
summary_text: After breaking up with his childhood sweetheart, a young man finds solace in drugs. Meanwhile, a teenage girl is caught in the world of prostitution. Will they be destroyed, or will they find redemption?

name: The Double
summary_text: A retired CIA operative is paired with a young FBI agent to unravel the mystery of a senator's murder, with all signs pointing to a Soviet assassin.

name: And Now for Something Completely Different
summary_text: An anthology of the best sketches from the first and second seasons of Monty Python's Flying Circus (1969).

name: The Shop Around the Corner
summary_text: Two employees at a gift shop can barely stand each other, without realizing that they are falling in love through the post as each other's anonymous pen pal.

name: Sorority Row
summary_text: A group of sorority sisters try to cover up the death of their house-sister after a prank gone wrong, only to be stalked by a serial killer.

name: Death Note
summary_text: A battle between the world's two greatest minds begins when Light Yagami finds the Death Note, a notebook with the power to kill, and decides to rid the world of criminals.

name: Ken Park
summary_text: Ken Park is about several Californian skateboarders' lives and relationships with and without their parents.

name: The Art of War
summary_text: UN's secretary general uses covert operations to help diplomacy along. Shaw's called back 6 months after one such operation. He witnesses the murder of Chinese UN ambassador at UN, NYC, chases the assassin and ends up a suspect.

name: Escape Plan 2: Hades
summary_text: Years after he fought his way out of an inescapable prison, Ray Breslin has organized a new top-notch security force. But when one of his team members goes missing, Breslin must return to the hell he once escaped from.

name: School for Scoundrels
summary_text: A young guy short on luck enrolls in a class to build confidence to help win over the girl of his dreams, which becomes complicated when it turns out his teacher has the same agenda.

name: The Darkest Minds
summary_text: Imprisoned by an adult world that now fears everyone under 18, a group of teens form a resistance group to fight back and reclaim control of their future.

name: Live Flesh
summary_text: After leaving jail, Víctor is still in love with Elena, but she's married to the former cop -now basketball player- who became paralysed by a shot from Víctor's gun...

name: The Babysitter: Killer Queen
summary_text: Two years after Cole survived a satanic blood cult, he's living another nightmare: high school. And the demons from his past? Still making his life hell.

name: Z for Zachariah
summary_text: In the wake of a disaster that wipes out most of civilization, two men and a young woman find themselves in an emotionally charged love triangle as the last known survivors.

name: The Titan
summary_text: A military family takes part in a ground-breaking experiment of genetic evolution and space exploration.

name: The Big Hit
summary_text: Socially anxious hitman Melvin Smiley, an expert in his lucrative field, goes on a job and falls in love with his kidnapping victim, turning his world upside down.

name: Back to School
summary_text: To help his discouraged son get through college, a funloving and obnoxious rich businessman decides to enter the school as a student himself.

name: Vivre Sa Vie
summary_text: Twelve episodic tales in the life of a Parisian woman and her slow descent into prostitution.

name: Blown Away
summary_text: An Irish bomber escapes from prison and targets a member of the Boston bomb squad.

name: Nine to Five
summary_text: Three female employees of a sexist, egotistical, lying, hypocritical bigot find a way to turn the tables on him.

name: Mesrine: Public Enemy No. 1
summary_text: The story of the notorious French gangster Jacques Mesrine, with the focus on his life and death as France's Public Enemy No. 1 in the 1970s.

name: Sweet Smell of Success
summary_text: Powerful but unethical Broadway columnist J.J. Hunsecker coerces unscrupulous press agent Sidney Falco into breaking up his sister's romance with a jazz musician.

name: Murder at 1600
summary_text: A young woman is murdered in the White House. Homicide detective Regis (Wesley Snipes) investigates while Secret Service works against him. He's assigned agent Chance (Diane Lane). She eventually cooperates after a man's framed.

name: Badhaai Ho
summary_text: A man is embarrassed when he finds out his mother is pregnant.

name: Wake Up Sid
summary_text: The story of a lazy Mumbai college student who does absolutely nothing, with a turn of events will Sid realize his potential in this world and become a success in the fast-paced life of Mumbai.

name: Powder
summary_text: An off the charts genius who is home schooled and shunned after his last relative dies shows the unconscious residents of his town about connection awareness and the generosity of the spirit.

name: The Good Liar
summary_text: Consummate con man Roy Courtnay has set his sights on his latest mark: the recently widowed Betty McLeish, worth millions. But this time, what should have been a simple swindle escalates into a cat-and-mouse game with the ultimate stakes.

name: A Street Cat Named Bob
summary_text: Based on the international best selling book. The true feel good story of how James Bowen, a busker and recovering drug addict, had his life transformed when he met a stray ginger cat.

name: His House
summary_text: A refugee couple makes a harrowing escape from war-torn South Sudan, but then they struggle to adjust to their new life in an English town that has an evil lurking beneath the surface.

name: Hardball
summary_text: An aimless young man who is scalping tickets, gambling, and drinking, agrees to coach a Little League team from the Cabrini Green housing project in Chicago as a condition of getting a loan from a friend.

name: The Sunset Limited
summary_text: Through a chance encounter, two men of opposing ideologies deliberate spiritual, philosophical, and profound matters in a New York City apartment.

name: All That Jazz
summary_text: Director/choreographer Bob Fosse tells his own life story as he details the sordid career of Joe Gideon, a womanizing, drug-using dancer.

name: Greta
summary_text: A young woman befriends a lonely widow who's harboring a dark and deadly agenda toward her.

name: Belle
summary_text: The mixed-race daughter, Dido Elizabeth Belle (Gugu Mbatha-Raw), of Royal Navy Captain Sir John Lindsay (Matthew Goode) is raised by aristocratic Great-uncle Lord William Murray, 1st Earl of Mansfield (Tom Wilkinson) in eighteenth century England.

name: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
summary_text: A Portokalos family secret brings the beloved characters back together for an even bigger and Greeker wedding.

name: Thinner
summary_text: An obese attorney is cursed by a gypsy to rapidly and uncontrollably lose weight.

name: Red River
summary_text: Dunson leads a cattle drive, the culmination of over 14 years of work, to its destination in Missouri. But his tyrannical behavior along the way causes a mutiny, led by his adopted son.

name: The Greatest Game Ever Played
summary_text: In the 1913 US Open, 20-year-old Francis Ouimet played golf against his idol, 1900 US Open champion, Englishman Harry Vardon.

name: The Aeronauts
summary_text: A balloon pilot and a scientist find themselves in a fight for survival while attempting to make discoveries in a gas balloon in the 1860s.

name: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
summary_text: Five siblings are left alone all summer when their mom leaves town and the evil babysitter bites the dust.

name: Borg vs. McEnroe
summary_text: The story of the 1980 tennis rivalry between the placid Björn Borg and the volatile John McEnroe.

name: How I Live Now
summary_text: An American girl, sent to the English countryside to stay with relatives, finds love and purpose while fighting for her survival as war envelops the world around her.

name: Club Dread
summary_text: When a serial killer interrupts the fun at the swanky Coconut Pete's Coconut Beach Resort--a hedonistic island paradise for swingers--it's up to the club's staff to stop the violence...or at least hide it.

name: Freaks
summary_text: A bold girl discovers a bizarre, threatening, and mysterious new world beyond her front door after she escapes her father's protective and paranoid control.

name: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre 2
summary_text: A radio host is victimized by the cannibal family as a former Texas Marshall hunts them.

name: Virtuosity
summary_text: When a virtual reality simulation created using the personalities of multiple serial killers manages to escape into the real world, an ex-cop is tasked with stopping its reign of terror.

name: Autumn Sonata
summary_text: A married daughter who longs for her mother's love is visited by the latter, a successful concert pianist.

name: Antitrust
summary_text: A computer programmer's dream job at a hot Portland-based firm turns nightmarish when he discovers his boss has a secret and ruthless means of dispatching anti-trust problems.

name: Take the Money and Run
summary_text: The life and times of Virgil Starkwell, inept bank robber.

name: Some Kind of Wonderful
summary_text: When Keith goes out with Amanda, the girl of his dreams, Amanda's ex-boyfriend plans to get back at Keith. Meanwhile, Keith's best friend, tomboy Watts, realizes she has feelings for Keith.

name: Open Grave
summary_text: A man wakes up in the wilderness, in a pit full of dead bodies, with no memory and must determine if the murderer is one of the strangers who rescued him, or if he himself is the killer.

name: One Night at McCool's
summary_text: Every man has a different recollection of the beautiful young woman who wreaked havoc on their lives during one heated night.

name: Hours
summary_text: A father struggles to keep his infant daughter alive in the wake of Hurricane Katrina.

name: The Perfect Man
summary_text: A lonely mother begins receiving romantic e-mails from a secret admirer, unaware that this perfect man is really a creation of her daughter who is trying to cheer her up.

name: 1492: Conquest of Paradise
summary_text: Christopher Columbus' discovery of the Americas and the effect this has on the indigenous people.

name: Gilda
summary_text: A small-time gambler hired to work in a Buenos Aires casino discovers his employer's new wife is his former lover.

name: You Can Count on Me
summary_text: A single mother's life is thrown into turmoil after her struggling, rarely seen younger brother returns to town.

name: Police Academy 6: City Under Siege
summary_text: Those bumbling cadets take to the streets when three inept goons successfully orchestrate a metropolitan crime wave.

name: Henry V
summary_text: In the midst of the Hundred Years War, the young King Henry V of England embarks on the conquest of France in 1415.

name: Weekend
summary_text: After a drunken house party with his straight mates, Russell heads out to a gay club. Just before closing time he picks up Glen but what's expected to be just a one-night stand becomes something else, something special.

name: The Barbarian Invasions
summary_text: During his final days, a dying man is reunited with old friends, former lovers, his ex-wife, and his estranged son.

name: Pushing Tin
summary_text: A feud develops between two air traffic controllers: one cocky and determined while the other is restrained and laidback, which inevitably affects their lives.

name: Barnyard
summary_text: When the farmer's away, all the animals play, and sing, and dance. Eventually, though, someone has to step in and run things, a responsibility that ends up going to Otis, a carefree cow.

name: Heist
summary_text: A father is without the means to pay for his daughter's medical treatment. As a last resort, he partners with a greedy co-worker to rob a casino. When things go awry they're forced to hijack a city bus.

name: Creep
summary_text: Trapped in a London subway station, a woman who's being pursued by a potential attacker heads into the unknown labyrinth of tunnels beneath the city's streets.

name: My Boss's Daughter
summary_text: After a man is asked to house sit for his boss, he becomes determined to get closer to the boss's daughter, but events keep unfolding that stop him from achieving his goal.

name: The Getaway
summary_text: A recently released ex-con and his loyal wife go on the run after a heist goes awry.

name: Taking Woodstock
summary_text: A man working at his parents' motel in the Catskills inadvertently sets in motion the generation-defining concert in the summer of 1969.

name: Rogue
summary_text: An American journalist on assignment in the Australian outback encounters a man-eating crocodile while trapped on a rapidly flooding mud island.

name: Equals
summary_text: In an emotionless utopia, two people fall in love when they regain their feelings from a mysterious disease, causing tensions between them and their society.

name: Fido
summary_text: Space radiation turns the dead into Zombies. Zomcon fights zombies and finds ways to pacify and use them. On pre-teen Timmy's (Kesun Loder's) 1950s suburban street, they all have a zombie doing menial chores. Timmy's zombie becomes his pet and friend, and is named Fido (Sir Billy Connolly).

name: Always
summary_text: The spirit of a recently deceased expert pilot mentors a newer pilot while watching him fall in love with the girlfriend that he left behind.

name: Lone Star
summary_text: When the skeleton of his murdered predecessor is found, Sheriff Sam Deeds unearths many other long-buried secrets in his Texas border town.

name: Tracks
summary_text: A young woman goes on a 1,700-mile trek across the deserts of West Australia with four camels and her faithful dog.

name: Fireworks
summary_text: Nishi leaves the police in the face of harrowing personal and professional difficulties. Spiraling into depression, he makes questionable decisions.

name: Another Year
summary_text: A look at four seasons in the lives of a happily married couple and their relationships with their family and friends.

name: Les yeux sans visage
summary_text: A surgeon causes an accident which leaves his daughter disfigured, and goes to extremes to give her a new face.

name: Victory
summary_text: As allied P.O.W.s prepare for a soccer game against the German National Team to be played in Nazi-occupied Paris, the French Resistance and British officers are making plans for the team's escape.

name: The Pink Panther Strikes Again
summary_text: Charles Dreyfus (Herbert Lom), who has finally cracked over Inspector Jacques Clouseau's (Peter Sellers') antics, escapes from a mental institution and launches an elaborate plan to get rid of Clouseau once and for all.

name: Joyeux Noel
summary_text: In December 1914, an unofficial Christmas truce on the Western Front allows soldiers from opposing sides of the First World War to gain insight into each other's way of life.

name: Dragon: The Bruce Lee Story
summary_text: A fictionalized account of the life of the martial arts superstar.

name: I Killed My Mother
summary_text: A semi-autobiographical story about Hubert as a young homosexual at odds with his mother.

name: Pulse
summary_text: When their computer hacker friend accidentally channels a mysterious wireless signal, a group of co-eds rally to stop a terrifying evil from taking over the world.

name: Fallen Angels
summary_text: This Hong Kong-set crime drama follows the lives of a hitman, hoping to get out of the business, and his elusive female partner.

name: The Tailor of Panama
summary_text: A tailor living in Panama reluctantly becomes a spy for a British Agent.

name: Miss Potter
summary_text: The story of Beatrix Potter, the author of the beloved and best-selling children's book, "The Tale of Peter Rabbit", and her struggle for love, happiness, and success.

name: Unfriended: Dark Web
summary_text: A teen comes into possession of a new laptop and soon discovers that the previous owner is not only watching him, but will also do anything to get it back.

name: The Lords of Salem
summary_text: Heidi, a radio DJ, is sent a box containing a record - a "gift from the Lords". The sounds within the grooves trigger flashbacks of her town's violent past. Is Heidi going mad, or are the Lords back to take revenge on Salem, Massachusetts?

name: Dabangg
summary_text: A corrupt police officer faces challenges from his family, gangsters and politicians.

name: Money Talks
summary_text: Sought by police and criminals, a small-time huckster makes a deal with a TV newsman for protection.

name: Happiest Season
summary_text: A holiday romantic comedy that captures the range of emotions tied to wanting your family's acceptance, being true to yourself, and trying not to ruin Christmas.

name: Lord of the Flies
summary_text: Stranded on an island, a group of schoolboys degenerate into savagery.

name: Astérix aux jeux olympiques
summary_text: Astérix and Obélix compete at the Olympics in order to help their friend Lovesix marry Princess Irina. Brutus also tries to win the game with his own team and get rid of his father Julius Caesar.

name: Knockin' on Heaven's Door
summary_text: Two terminally ill patients escape from a hospital, steal a car and rush towards the sea.

name: On Golden Pond
summary_text: Norman is a curmudgeon with an estranged relationship with his daughter Chelsea. At Golden Pond, he and his wife nevertheless agree to care for Billy, the son of Chelsea's new boyfriend, and a most unexpected relationship blooms.

name: Friends with Money
summary_text: After she quits her lucrative job, Olivia finds herself unsure about her future and her relationships with her successful and wealthy friends.

name: Wait Until Dark
summary_text: A recently blinded woman is terrorized by a trio of thugs while they search for a heroin-stuffed doll they believe is in her apartment.

name: Singles
summary_text: A group of twenty-something friends search for love and success in grunge-era Seattle.

name: Padmaavat
summary_text: Set in medieval Rajasthan, Queen Padmavati is married to a noble king and they live in a prosperous fortress with their subjects until an ambitious Sultan hears of Padmavati's beauty and forms an obsessive love for the Queen of Mewar.

name: Countdown
summary_text: When a nurse downloads an app that claims to predict the moment a person will die, it tells her she only has three days to live. With the clock ticking and a figure haunting her, she must find a way to save her life before time runs out.

name: Only Yesterday
summary_text: A twenty-seven-year-old office worker travels to the countryside while reminiscing about her childhood in Tokyo.

name: The Eye
summary_text: A blind girl gets a cornea transplant so that she will be able to see again. She gets more than she bargained for upon realizing she can also see ghosts.

name: The Man Without a Face
summary_text: Chuck wants to leave home but can't make the grade for boarding school. Then he finds out the disfigured recluse living nearby is an ex-teacher.

name: An Affair to Remember
summary_text: A couple falls in love and agrees to meet in six months at the Empire State Building - but will it happen?

name: Time of the Gypsies
summary_text: In this luminous tale set in the area around Sarajevo and in Italy, Perhan, an engaging young Romany (gypsy) with telekinetic powers, is seduced by the quick-cash world of petty crime, which threatens to destroy him and those he loves.

name: Universal Soldier: The Return
summary_text: The "universal soldiers" must fight the whole army, when the military's supercomputer S.E.T.H gets out of control.
